name: spo-associate-multiple-sites-to-hub
title: Associate Multiple Site Collections to Hub Site
shortDescription: This script can be used to associate multiple site collections to Hub site; you can provide list of site collection urls in the array.

thumbnails.alt: Preview of the sample Associate Multiple Site Collections to Hub Site

references.name: Want to learn more about PnP PowerShell and the cmdlets
references.description: Check out the PnP PowerShell site to get started and for the reference to the cmdlets.
